issue.title: [C++] bz2 / zstd tests not enabled
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6864](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6864). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When passing `-DARROW_WITH_ZSTD=on` and `-DARROW_WITH_BZ2=on`, the relevant tests in `arrow-compression-test` and `arrow-io-compressed-test` are still not enabled.
